main event: An observer reported seeing a horizontal row of red lights in the sky on November 19, 1959, near Crystal Springs, Mississippi.
interesting points: The observer initially thought the lights were a warning beacon., The lights varied in intensity and created a perception of a solid object., The object was described as having the appearance of a helicopter., The observer stated there was no sound at all during the sighting., The object started slowly before rapidly increasing its speed.
sighted object: a row of red lights in the sky
witness description: An observer, a 35-year-old woodworker and deacon in the First Baptist Church of Crystal Springs.
